verses.text: Behold, a \w king|strong="H4428"\w* shall \w reign|strong="H4427"\w* in \w righteousness|strong="H6664"\w*, and \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* shall \w rule|strong="H8323"\w* in \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*.

And a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* shall be as an hiding \w place|strong="H4224"\w* from the \w wind|strong="H7307"\w*, and a \w covert|strong="H5643"\w* from the \w tempest|strong="H2230"\w*; as \w rivers|strong="H6388"\w* of \w water|strong="H4325"\w* in a dry \w place|strong="H6724"\w*, as the \w shadow|strong="H6738"\w* of a \w great|strong="H3515"\w* \w rock|strong="H5553"\w* in a \w weary|strong="H5889"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*.\f + \fr 32.2 \ft great: Heb. heavy\f*

And the \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* of them that \w see|strong="H7200"\w* shall not be \w dim|strong="H8159"\w*, and the \w ears|strong="H0241"\w* of them that \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* shall \w hearken|strong="H7181"\w*.

The \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* also of the \w rash|strong="H4116"\w* shall \w understand|strong="H0995"\w* \w knowledge|strong="H1847"\w*, and the \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w* of the \w stammerers|strong="H5926"\w* shall be \w ready|strong="H4116"\w* to \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w plainly|strong="H6703"\w*.\f + \fr 32.4 \ft rash: Heb. hasty\f*\f + \fr 32.4 \ft plainly: or, elegantly\f*

The vile \w person|strong="H5036"\w* shall be no more \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w liberal|strong="H5081"\w*, nor the \w churl|strong="H3596"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \add to be\add* \w bountiful|strong="H7771"\w*.

For the vile \w person|strong="H5036"\w* will \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w villany|strong="H5039"\w*, and his \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* will \w work|strong="H6213"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H0205"\w*, to \w practise|strong="H6213"\w* \w hypocrisy|strong="H2612"\w*, and to \w utter|strong="H1696"\w* \w error|strong="H8442"\w* against the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, to make \w empty|strong="H7324"\w* the \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* of the \w hungry|strong="H7457"\w*, and he will cause the \w drink|strong="H4945"\w* of the \w thirsty|strong="H6771"\w* to \w fail|strong="H2637"\w*.

The \w instruments|strong="H3627"\w* also of the \w churl|strong="H3596"\w* \add are\add* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*: he \w deviseth|strong="H3289"\w* wicked \w devices|strong="H2154"\w* to \w destroy|strong="H2254"\w* the \w poor|strong="H6041"\w* with \w lying|strong="H8267"\w* \w words|strong="H0561"\w*, even when the \w needy|strong="H0034"\w* \w speaketh|strong="H1696"\w* \w right|strong="H4941"\w*.\f + \fr 32.7 \ft the needy…: or, he speaketh against the poor in judgment\f*

But the \w liberal|strong="H5081"\w* \w deviseth|strong="H3289"\w* liberal \w things|strong="H5081"\w*; and by liberal \w things|strong="H5081"\w* shall he \w stand|strong="H6965"\w*.\f + \fr 32.8 \ft stand: or, be established\f*

¶ Rise \w up|strong="H6965"\w*, ye \w women|strong="H0802"\w* that are at \w ease|strong="H7600"\w*; \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* my \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*, ye \w careless|strong="H0982"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*; give \w ear|strong="H0238"\w* unto my \w speech|strong="H0565"\w*.

Many \w days|strong="H3117"\w* and \w years|strong="H8141"\w* shall ye be \w troubled|strong="H7264"\w*, ye careless \w women|strong="H0982"\w*: for the \w vintage|strong="H1210"\w* shall \w fail|strong="H3615"\w*, the \w gathering|strong="H0625"\w* shall not \w come|strong="H0935"\w*.\f + \fr 32.10 \ft Many…: Heb. Days above a year\f*

\w Tremble|strong="H2729"\w*, ye women that are at \w ease|strong="H7600"\w*; be \w troubled|strong="H7264"\w*, ye careless \w ones|strong="H0982"\w*: \w strip|strong="H6584"\w* you, and make you \w bare|strong="H6209"\w*, and \w gird|strong="H2290"\w* \add sackcloth\add* upon \add your\add* \w loins|strong="H2504"\w*.

They shall \w lament|strong="H5594"\w* for the \w teats|strong="H7699"\w*, for the \w pleasant|strong="H2531"\w* \w fields|strong="H7704"\w*, for the \w fruitful|strong="H6509"\w* \w vine|strong="H1612"\w*.\f + \fr 32.12 \ft pleasant…: Heb. fields of desire\f*

Upon the \w land|strong="H0127"\w* of my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* shall come \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w thorns|strong="H6975"\w* \add and\add* \w briers|strong="H8068"\w*; yea, upon all the \w houses|strong="H1004"\w* of \w joy|strong="H4885"\w* \add in\add* the \w joyous|strong="H5947"\w* \w city|strong="H7151"\w*:\f + \fr 32.13 \ft yea…: or, burning upon\f*

Because the \w palaces|strong="H0759"\w* shall be \w forsaken|strong="H5203"\w*; the \w multitude|strong="H1995"\w* of the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* shall be \w left|strong="H5800"\w*; the \w forts|strong="H6076"\w* and \w towers|strong="H0975"\w* shall be for \w dens|strong="H4631"\w* \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*, a \w joy|strong="H4885"\w* of wild \w asses|strong="H6501"\w*, a \w pasture|strong="H4829"\w* of \w flocks|strong="H5739"\w*;\f + \fr 32.14 \ft forts…: or, clifts and watchtowers\f*

Until the \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* be \w poured|strong="H6168"\w* upon us from on \w high|strong="H4791"\w*, and the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* be a fruitful \w field|strong="H3759"\w*, and the fruitful \w field|strong="H3759"\w* be \w counted|strong="H2803"\w* for a \w forest|strong="H3293"\w*.

Then \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* shall \w dwell|strong="H7931"\w* in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*, and \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w* \w remain|strong="H3427"\w* in the fruitful \w field|strong="H3759"\w*.

And the \w work|strong="H4639"\w* of \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w* shall be \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*; and the \w effect|strong="H5656"\w* of \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w* \w quietness|strong="H8252"\w* and \w assurance|strong="H0983"\w* \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*.

And my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* shall \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* in a \w peaceable|strong="H7965"\w* \w habitation|strong="H5116"\w*, and in \w sure|strong="H4009"\w* \w dwellings|strong="H4908"\w*, and in \w quiet|strong="H7600"\w* resting \w places|strong="H4496"\w*;

When it shall \w hail|strong="H1258"\w*, coming \w down|strong="H3381"\w* on the \w forest|strong="H3293"\w*; and the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* shall be \w low|strong="H8213"\w* in a low \w place|strong="H8218"\w*.\f + \fr 32.19 \ft low in…: or, utterly abased\f*

\w Blessed|strong="H0835"\w* \add are\add* ye that \w sow|strong="H2232"\w* beside all \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*, that send \w forth|strong="H7971"\w* \add thither\add* the \w feet|strong="H7272"\w* of the \w ox|strong="H7794"\w* and the \w ass|strong="H2543"\w*.
